file_content.text: Thank you for your assistance in saving Coronet City's water resources. You are a credit to your clan.
You have everything I asked for? Magnificent. Your clan would be proud of you.
I'll dispatch these materials to my work crews immediately. There is still enough time to save Coronet City's water resources.
I have recorded your images. Rest assured, you will be properly credited for your heroism today.
I have not studied the Jedi clan in any detail, but I have heard your motto: May the floor be with you.
The Republic military will be informed of your heroism. I'm sure you will receive many commendations.
I will see to it you are properly recognized for your contributions to Coronet City's ecosystem.
Without the precise materials, Coronet City's water resources will become unalterably toxic.
Attend my words carefully, gentlebeings. It is absolutely vital you assist me. Coronet City is in prodigious danger!
Attend my words carefully, gentlebeing. It is absolutely vital you assist me. Coronet City is in prodigious danger!
The Corellian Chemical Corporation's main factory was obliterated in the last bombardment. Its pipelines are rupturing into the underground aquifer.
Unless we repair the damage, Coronet City's water resources will become unalterably toxic in a few hours. Everyone consuming it will perish--potentially millions.
The enemy wants as many people dead as possible.
That's what the Empire hopes.
My calculations indicate at least five-hundred thousand deaths in the first hour alone. That is simply unacceptable.
You must warn everyone to avoid the water until we can make it safe.
Alert the authorities.
The hostilities here have disrupted communications. There is no chance of warning everyone. We must act.
We're having a hard enough time getting supplies here as it is. We can't afford to airlift water.
The army needs its water.
Your own clan's needs are not the point. This city is home to millions.
I only drink poisonous beverages when I'm at the cantina--and even then, rarely.
I prefer my water clean.
Shall I infer you have a personal stake in this? I suppose that's helpful.
What species are you?
If you must know, I am a Drall. More importantly, I am Doctor Ernisto Misar, senior environmental specialist.
No one's going to die, short fry... but someone will make a fortune selling bottled water.
Stop panicking, little thing.
Your words do not make any sense. Is the atmosphere more contaminated at your breathing height?
My work clan can repair the ruptured pipelines, but they require specialized materials--all of which are in the combat zone nearby.
You have the strength of numbers and are obviously skilled at battle. You could easily obtain the materials I require.
Tell us where to go.
We'll handle the combat zone.
No, we can't. [Refuse quest]
Based on your appearance, I surmise you are a Jedi. You could easily survive long enough to obtain the materials I require.
I am a scientist, not a soldier. You, on the other hand, are a soldier. Will you obtain the materials I require?
Since you are not running about in blind panic, I assume you have martial skills I lack. Can you obtain the materials I need?
Point me to the materials.
Leave the combat zone to me.
I will provide you with a complete list of what I require. Once you have everything, return to me immediately.
Learn to fight. [Refuse quest]
When you become thirsty from all this fighting, you'll regret not helping.
Please do not disturb me. Performing calculations in a war zone is not as easy as it appears.
